snippet: Maria Sharapova said on her Web site that Coach Thomas Hogstedt would be unable to travel in the immediate future and that they agreed she should find another coach.
abstract: Maria Sharapova and coach Thomas Hogstedt have decided to part ways after nearly three years of working together; other tennis items noted.
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova said on her Web site that Coach Thomas Hogstedt would be unable to travel in the immediate future and that they agreed she should find another coach.

headline.main: Sharapova and Her Coach Part Ways
